name: HistoricalVoices
0:
”Alexa, open Historical Voices”
”Alexa, start Historical Voices”
”Alexa, Launch Historical Voices”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: historical voices
des:
Historical Voices will play an audio clip from one of the 52 featured leaders of our time. Relive some of the most important moments of the last 80 years. Below is a list of the leaders or events featured in this skill or you can just ask for the list in the skill. The more you listen the more you unlock! Keep listening and learning.

 Also you can now request a person or event just by saying request followed by their name or the event.

Relive the important moments of the last 80 years.

Updated for the Echo Show now with APL!
The following leaders are featured in this skill:
01. Agatha Christie
02. Albert Einstein
03. Amelia Earhart
04. Apollo 13
05. Arthur C Clarke
06. Babe Ruth
07. Barack Obama
